preprocessor module¶

This Preprocessor class provides cleaning and filetring of the data provided in the data folder under root folder

Returns data with selected countries.

product to be filtered.

returns Pandas dataframe with selected product and countries.

by_product(product: str) → pandas.core.frame.DataFrame¶

list_countries(intext='') → list¶

List all the countries available in a data file

intextTYPE, optional

return list of countries matching intext string. The default is “”.

List

list with specified countries. If nothing or all is given, it returns all the countries.

list_products() → list¶

List products available in a data file

list

list with possible product entries.

list_years() → list¶

List years available in a data file

available_timelist

list with possible time entries.
